title: Interpretation of fainting in a dream: seeing fainting in a dream

preview.html: Seeing fainting and loss of consciousness for an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and an unmarried and married man suffering from headaches and headaches, etc. by Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Aw. Sadiq and Al-Nabulsi are missing. If you dream of fainting, this symbolizes an illness in your family and disturbing news about the absent. If a girl dreams that she is fainting, this means that she will get sick and be disappointed due to her reckless lifestyle. Interpretation of seeing fainting or loss of consciousness in a dream Imam Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, mentioned that whoever sees in his dream that he has lost consciousness and lost consciousness, then some undesirable concepts and connotations appear in his vision that do not have good consequences for the dreamer, so it came. The sayings of some interpreters that losing consciousness or fainting in a dream is an indication of the occurrence of some sad events in the dreamer's real life, which causes him sadness and distress. In other sayings by some interpreters, the interpretation was based on differentiating between a male or female fortune teller. If a man sees in his dream that he has fainted and lost consciousness, then seeing this indicates evil or sadness that befalls him in reality, as for the woman who sees in her dream that she has fainted and lost consciousness, this vision may indicate the joy, happiness and goodness that she obtains in her reality, confirming that weakness in a woman's sleep is strength in reality, and the illness that afflicts her or fainting is good in her wakefulness. The woman who sees in her dream that she has lost consciousness and entered a state of fainting, this vision indicates the coming of some events that will fill her with happiness and joy in the coming days, God willing. The woman may carry the good news of pregnancy in the coming days if she is married, but if this woman is pregnant, her vision indicates the safety of the fetus and natural birth, God willing. Seeing her vision shows the exit of fatigue, distress and worries and the coming of relief and good news for the coming days, God willing. Interpretation of fainting in a dream YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about burning a prayer rug in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about burning a prayer rug in a dream. We may want to know the interpretation of a dream about burning a blanket in a dream, and we find that it is one of the dreams that some people want to know the interpretation of. Let us learn about the interpretations of labor scholars for this dream, and the reader should know that the site managers do not make interpretations, but rather it is based on Heart of the interpretations of some scholars. Interpretation of a dream about burning a prayer rug in a dream. Burning a prayer rug in a dream can indicate many sins that the dreamer has committed in his life and he must seek God’s help. Whoever dreams of burning a prayer rug may indicate many problems and crises that the dreamer faces. The vision in his life at that time. In the event that he sees burning prayer carpets in a dream, this may indicate financial difficulties that the dreamer may face in his life during those days and he must seek God’s help. Seeing burning carpets in a dream may indicate some obstacles that the dreamer will face. The vision during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about losing a prayer rug in a dream: Losing a prayer rug in a dream may indicate the difficulty of achieving the desires and dreams that the dreamer dreamed of. If a person sees that the prayer rug is missing, this may indicate that he is not performing his duties and acts of worship, and he must seek help from God. If he sees the loss of prayer rugs, this may indicate changes occurring in the life of the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. And if he sees old carpets in a dream, this may indicate that he He did not feel stable and happy at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about cutting a carpet in a dream: Anyone who dreams that he is cutting carpets indicates many problems that were present in his life during those days and he must ask for God’s help. Seeing cutting carpets in a dream may It indicates some difficulties that the dreamer faces in his professional life and he needs to ask God for help. title: Interpretation of a dream about a wedding and the wedding night in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a wedding and a wedding night in a dream A dream about a wedding and a wedding night indicates changes that a person is exposed to, whether with his family, friends, work, etc. Seeing a wedding and a wedding night in a dream shows that the dreamer will face many problems but can overcome them. A dream about a lover symbolizes that The husband will face a major financial crisis, but his wife will stand by his side to solve this problem. If a man sees in his dream all the details of the wedding night, this means that he will face a major financial crisis, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing him on the wedding night for a single woman. Ibn Sirin said that a dream about a night The wedding of a single girl indicates the many consequences that the dreamer will be exposed to. If he sees a free girl on the wedding night in a dream, it means that he will be arrested, and God knows best. Seeing the wedding night symbolizes its details, and it is a sign of marital problems that both spouses are exposed to. One commentator pointed out that seeing The wedding night in a dream symbolizes the instability of the family and God is the Most High. Interpretation of seeing a wedding in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman getting married a second time means in a dream the arrival of goodness, livelihood, and abundant money for her. Seeing a married woman in a dream symbolizes marriage to someone she does not know, which indicates That she will move to a new home with her husband. If a married woman sees that she is marrying someone she knows, this means that she will hear good news. If a married woman dreams that she will marry someone other than her husband, then this dream indicates that she will become pregnant soon. Seeing a wedding in a pregnant woman’s dream if she A pregnant woman dreams that she is getting married, then this dream indicates that her due date is approaching. If a pregnant woman sees that she is marrying an unknown man, this means that her husband will travel soon. In the event that she sees a pregnant woman marrying her ex-husband, which indicates that she will return to her ex-husband. Seeing a pregnant woman getting married in a dream It means that she will give birth to a child who does not suffer from a birth defect, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a suit or a wedding dress in a dream If one sees a wedding suit in a dream, this dream indicates the social changes that are occurring in the dreamer’s life. Ibn Sirin said that seeing a suit in a dream means The husband’s intense love for his wife, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing the suit in a fortuneteller’s dream symbolizes the arrival of sustenance, kindness, and abundant money to the woman. The wedding dress shows an unmarried woman in a dream that she will soon marry a righteous man who will protect her, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a wedding day in a dreamIf one sees the night The wedding in the dream, and that was in the month of Muharram, so this dream means that the dream will come true soon, God willing. I mean the wedding night in the dream is the novelist’s ability to overcome crises and problems in a short period of time. If a person dreams that he is getting married, this means that he will be released from the prison in which he was kept. For a long time. Ibn Shaheen said that seeing a wedding night in a dream symbolizes improved living conditions and family stability. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a wedding night by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin showed that marriage in a dream means that the dreamer will

title: Interpretation of removing a ring in a dream. Removing a ring in a dream

preview.html:
The vision of removing the ring from the finger of an unmarried girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, whether she is wearing gold or silver, or buying or selling, or losing or breaking, Ibn Sirin’s engagement ring. The dream of removing the ring from the finger of the fiancée does not carry any real danger, so do not worry about staying away from your partner, betrayal, or All these illusions. On the contrary, this dream indicates getting rid of the difficulties and difficulties that you face in your real life. If you are married, seeing the ring removed means the possibility of separation, marital problems, or the husband being exposed to a certain problem. If you see yourself entering a jewelry store to buy a ring, this indicates That you will get married if you are single, and if you are married you will have a child. On the other hand, if you see yourself selling a ring in a jewelry store, this indicates separation, distance, or loss of material. If you see a gold ring in your dream, this indicates separation between you and your lover or your fiancé. If the ring is silver, then be sure of marriage if you are engaged or engaged if it is You have a relationship with someone. If you see a ring decorated with diamonds, it means that you will meet a person with power, influence and strong culture. If you see that your husband gave you a ring, know that you will get pregnant soon. But if you see that you are losing or selling your wedding ring, this indicates separation and distance from your husband. Seeing a ring in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the gender of the baby. If the ring is gold, you are pregnant with a boy. If the ring is silver, you will have a girl. If you are single and dream that you are wearing a wedding ring or a ring or that you found a ring somewhere, this indicates that you will find a suitable groom for you and marry him. If you are married and see this dream, this is evidence that you will become pregnant and give birth to a boy. Prisoner In a dream it is a sign of relief from the pain that a person is experiencing and also shows what the dreamer is trying to achieve. Whoever gives his cell in a dream or buys it from someone will obtain a position that he tried hard to obtain. The dreamer who wears a cage or an iron ring in a dream will receive goodness after fatigue, and the one who wears an empty chain will find something good. Whoever sees in a dream a captive and gets married and has He was born, and whoever borrows a prisoner will have something that will not remain with him for a long time. As for whoever breaks his cell in a dream, he will divorce his wife, and whoever sells his cell, his wife will leave him.
Ring Interpretation - YouTube Interpretation of seeing divorce in a dream YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about a single woman marrying someone she loves

preview.html: Many girls dream of marriage, and in the encyclopedia we will learn about the interpretation of the dream of marrying someone they love in different situations. Many women who have never been married before have beautiful visions, such as marrying a man they love, who gives a feeling of happiness and joy to the heart because it stems from his desire to achieve it. . Indeed, the great scholar Ibn Sirin explains it as a sign of hearing and good news for the dreamer in general and an encyclopedia that we will follow. Explain to you the consequences of seeing a single woman marrying a man she loves. Interpretation of a dream about a single woman marrying someone she loves. One of the auspicious dreams for unmarried women is to see herself wearing a dress on her wedding day with the man she loves, because it is news of the coming of goodness for her and that God will make her happy and God will bring her through. ready. And God knows best. The scholar and sheikh of translators, Ibn Shirin, says that seeing an unmarried girl marrying a man she loves is a sign that her marriage will be consummated soon, and that God has answered her prayer. But if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is marrying a man she loves, and she feels sad This expresses her fear of losing that person, but God will fulfill her dream and marry him. An unmarried woman who sees that she is marrying a man she loves very much, this is a sign that news is coming and that she will succeed in her life. This dream can have a good interpretation and an unpleasant interpretation, For example, if an unmarried girl sees that she is marrying someone she loves, this is evidence that she will not marry him, and God knows best. In the end, interpretation comes with guesswork, and guesswork can be both wrong and correct, and therefore we should not rely primarily on the dreams that we see in our dreams. for interpretation. Another dream in an encyclopedia, an instant dream interpretation application can be used

title: Interpretation of a dream about blood coming out of the mouth in a dream

Interpretation of the dream of blood coming out of the mouth in a dream: Blood coming out of the mouth in a dream may indicate a difficult period that the dreamer was going through and it will end soon. Seeing blood coming out of the mouth in a dream may indicate a difficult period that the dreamer was going through and that will end soon. The mouth in a dream may indicate the end of the experience and adversity that has been experienced for a long time. Seeing blood coming out of the mouth in a dream may indicate the social changes that the dreamer will face during this time. In the case of dreaming of blood coming out of the mouth, this may indicate negative energy that is being released Among them is the dreamer with the grace of God. Interpretation of a dream about my soul leaving my body in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that his soul has left his body, this may indicate the severe distress that the person feels in those days. Seeing the soul leaving the body in a dream may indicate the sorrows that the owner is going through. Seeing a lot during this time. A dream about the soul leaving the body in a dream may indicate the psychological comfort that the dreamer may enjoy in those days thanks to God. A dream that shows my soul leaving my body in a dream may indicate the comfort that can be obtained in those days, And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a bottle coming out of his leg in a dream: A bottle coming out of his leg in a dream may indicate getting rid of bad memories that were bothering him in the previous period. A dream about glass coming out of his leg in a dream may indicate the end of the crisis that the dreamer suffered from in those days. Whoever sees in his dream that he was taking a glass from his stem and blood came out, this may be evidence of success and success in life thanks to God. The glass that comes out of his stem in a dream is a good omen for the dreamer of the happy events that will come to him in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream A dream about worms coming out from under the nails in a dream: A dream about worms coming out from under the nails in a dream may indicate goodness coming to the dreamer in those days. In the case of a dream about worms coming out from under the nails in a dream, this may indicate the end of the difficulties and crises that the dreamer may face at that time. In the case of dreaming of worms coming out from under the nails, this may indicate that he has great fears and that the dreamer needs to ask God for help to get rid of them. Seeing worms coming out from under the nails in a dream may indicate repentance for the sins and disobedience that the dreamer committed in the previous days. Thanks to him. Interpretation of a dream about a coffin leaving the house in a dream. The coffin leaving the house in a dream may indicate moving from one place to another that is better than that. A person’s dream of a coffin being brought from the house may indicate the power that the dreamer enjoyed at that time. title: What is the interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream and he is silent, according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream while he is silent: There is no doubt that seeing death or the deceased is one of the visions that send a kind of fear and terror to the heart, especially if the dead person only sees his silence, as it is linked to his condition and appearance, and in this article we take a look at all the indicators and cases in more detail. Detail and explanation. Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream while he is silent. Seeing death expresses despair, death of the heart, and committing sins and disobedience. Death can be a symbol of rebirth, repentance, and guidance. Seeing a dead person is linked to his condition and body. Whoever sees a dead person sad and in his state of silence, this indicates regret and disappointment. As he passed away, and the condition of his family and relatives deteriorated after his departure, his debts may increase and he needs someone to pay them. On his behalf so that God may have mercy on him and save him from Hell. And if he sees the dead alive after his death, this indicates the resurrection of dashed hopes in the heart and the disappearance of despair and sadness from him. Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream while he is silent by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that the interpretation of seeing a dead person relates to his condition, appearance, and what he does. And whoever sees a dead person in a dream while he is silent Silent while he is sad, this is his sadness over his condition and comfort, or his distress over the dreamer’s condition and what he is going through. And if he sees the dead person bidding him farewell while he is silent, this indicates the loss of what he was striving for, and a lack of money and prestige. Interpretation of seeing a dead man in a dream while he is silent about an unmarried woman. Married: Seeing death for an unmarried woman expresses her loss of hope in something she strives for, and if she sees that she is dying, this indicates the despair that envelops her heart from life or the sin in which she continues, and death is also evidence. From close marriage, which changes the situation and makes things easier. If you see a dead woman not speaking and there is silence, this indicates what she lacks in her life and cannot reach. Desires may accumulate in her and she cannot satisfy them. If he knows the dead person, then it is his need and desire to see him and talk to him. If he sees the dead person silent and does not speak to her, he may become angry with her for not fulfilling his rights and forgetting the vows and trust he left for her. Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream while he is silent for a married woman: Death or the vision of death is considered a sign of excessive worry, anxiety, and the inconveniences of life, and it is a symbol of burdensome trust and grave responsibilities, and it may Her husband burdens her with more than she can bear, and she seeks comfort and freedom from constraints and restrictions. The pressures that surround her and prevent her from achieving her goal. If she sees a dead person silent, this indicates the ordeal she is going through, and the tribulations and crises that follow it. The vision may depend on her urgent need for support and help to pass this stage safely. If she sees a dead person she knows is silent, this indicates On the lack of feelings of tenderness, care and protection, and she may find in her life a deficiency that she cannot compensate for, but if the dead person is unknown, then this vision is a reminder of her duties and obedience and distancing herself from neglect and suspicion. Interpretation of seeing the deceased in a dream while he is silent for the pregnant woman. Seeing death in her dream symbolizes fears That surrounds her, the restrictions that bedding requires, and the psychological and nervous pressures that push her to perform actions that she does not accept.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a giraffe bite in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a giraffe bite in a dream Let us learn today about all the interpretations and connotations of this vision, which is one of the dreams that indicate good or bad. Today we will learn about all the interpretations and connotations of the one who speaks today. Interpretation of a dream about a giraffe bite in a dream. A giraffe bite in a dream is a sign of the emotional shock that the dreamer may be exposed to during this period. Seeing a giraffe being bitten or kicked in a dream is a sign of a major psychological crisis that the dreamer suffers from because of his friends or those close to him. Seeing a giraffe bite in a dream is a sign of an illness that may afflict the dreamer, but he will recover, God willing. Seeing a giraffe being bitten in a dream is a sign of a major financial crisis that the dreamer will be exposed to for some time. Interpretation of a dream about a giraffe Seeing a giraffe in a dream is a sign of the great good that the dreamer will obtain in those days. Seeing a giraffe in a dream is a sign of great dedication to morals and principles during this period. When you see a giraffe in a dream, this is a sign of abundant nutrition and good insight. Seeing a giraffe in a dream is a sign of good morals and happiness that the dreamer will obtain in the coming days. Interpretation of a dream about feeding a giraffe in a dream Seeing yourself feeding a giraffe in The dream is a sign that you will get a lot of money in the coming days. Seeing yourself feeding a giraffe in a dream is a sign of overcoming the worries and problems that appear in the fortuneteller's life during this period. Seeing yourself feeding a giraffe in a dream is a sign of the husband's imminent journey or the position he will soon acquire. Interpretation of a dream about carrying a giraffe in a dream Anyone who dreams of carrying a giraffe is a sign of the ease of childbirth for a pregnant woman in the coming days. Seeing a giraffe carrying a giraffe in a dream is a sign of a new baby who will arrive in the family during this time. Seeing a giraffe carrying a giraffe in a dream indicates the good news coming to the people of the house in the coming period. Seeing a giraffe carrying a giraffe in a dream indicates the positive changes that occurred in the dreamer's dream during that period. Interpretation of a dream about eating giraffe meat in a dream Seeing a giraffe eating meat in a dream is a sign of his bad behavior with a woman near him at that time. If you see a giraffe eating meat in a dream, this means that the husband will marry another woman during this period. Seeing a giraffe eating meat in a dream indicates the concessions that the dreamer makes to those around him during that period. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a giraffe in a dream Seeing a giraffe giving birth in a dream is a sign of Expansion of the livelihood of the people of the house during that period. Anyone who dreams of giving birth to a giraffe is a sign of the good luck that the dreamer will have in those days. If the man who gives birth to the giraffe is a sign of her endless strength, then those days will come. Interpretation of seeing the birth of a giraffe in a dream is a sign of achieving goals and ambitions during this period. Interpretation of a dream of a giraffe chasing me in a dream Seeing a giraffe chasing me in a dream is a sign of achieving goals and ambitions during this time. Seeing a man chasing a giraffe

title: Interpretation of worms in a pregnant woman’s dream

preview.html: Seeing worms in the dream of a pregnant woman, married woman, divorced woman, or unmarried girl. Dreaming of white worms in bed. Eating white worms on dates in a mango. Worms coming out of the chest, from the leg, from the vaginal opening. By Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, and others. There are some visions and dreams that have not been interpreted, but they are in reality. It has a meaning that one must know in order to preach, but some of the interpreters in the book have come up with some different interpretations for each interpretation and vision of a dream, but they all agree on the general meaning and content of the interpretation of the visions. As the visions are usually from Almighty God and they are right before the dawn prayer. After the dawn prayer, the dream is from Satan, and often the dream does not come true because it is a lie from Satan, but it is necessary to know the interpretation of seeing worms in a dream because worms are annoying insects, so some people wonder about the interpretation of seeing worms because it is something that really bothers them. Interpretation of worms in a dream for a pregnant womanThe vision of a pregnant woman Being infected with worms in a dream is something worthy of praise, as most translators and scholars have said, as it is said that seeing it is good news for her safety and the safety of her fetus. Whoever dreams of seeing worms in a specific area in the apartment during marriage, this indicates the presence of a relative or neighbor who does not want you to coexist with worms in her dream. If she is divorced, this indicates that there are people who do not want to reconcile her with your husband. And whoever sees worms in her dream while she is alone, this indicates the presence of a member of your family who does not want you to live your life. Interpretation of worms in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that worms in a dream indicate more than Interpretation, but the general interpretation of worms is that it is envy and malice from some people who live around you, but there are certain situations in which worms are interpreted in a different way. If the lady of the house sees worms in the place of her kitchen, this indicates the presence of another woman who wants to do some magic in that place. .

title: Interpretation of lice in a dream by Ibn Sirin, interpretation of a dream about lice in hair for a girl, and interpretation of a dream about black lice for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of lice in a dream for a girl: Seeing lice in a dream is a very disturbing dream, as it is considered one of the harmful insects that cause girls to suffer from serious skin diseases, and seeing it in a dream makes the dreamer feel anxious and upset and search for a therapeutic interpretation for it. And you begin to resort to the dream interpretation books that we have provided to you, with everything that contains interpretations. What is the interpretation of lice in a dream for a girl? Lice in a single person’s dream does not express negatives along the line as some people think, but seeing them brings many positive interpretations that portend the occurrence of some events. Interesting, and here are some interpretations according to the different details that one woman says he sees. When lice eats a girl’s head, she is actually facing many challenges in her life and she is unable to confront them. Hope. Some scholars said that seeing it in abundance is good and abundant, and if he is of marriageable age, then he will marry a rich man and find with him the happiness he wants. But if she finds that the lice in her hair have left traces on the skin, then she is exposed to a major problem and needs someone to provide It has the advice to be able to get rid of it, and most often this is a problem. It relates to an emotional relationship in which you cannot choose the other part. If a girl was combing her hair and was surprised by a large lice that fell from her, this is a warning of a serious problem that she may face because of evil people entering her life, taking advantage of her kindness and helplessness. To think correctly, and many times also that the god lives in a broken family, which made her throw herself into the arms of these sinners. It was also said that when she found lice walking on the floor of her room, a happy event and news would soon happen that she had wanted to come to her for a while Long. What is the interpretation of lice in a dream by Ibn Sirin? The scholar Ibn Sirin addressed the interpretation of this dream, explaining that it does not raise anxiety as it does in reality, but it promises the girl that the days of sadness that have prolonged her will soon end. If she is going through a financial crisis and her ways are narrowed and she does not find someone to help her. It helps her pay off her debts. Seeing her lice in abundance in her dream portends her great wealth that she can obtain through inheritance. Who has not thought about that. As for the lice that are biting the skin of her head, and she is suffering from severe pain, there is a person following her and trying to tempt her in various ways, and she resists him at first, but he insists on malicious intentions, which is what he can influence and make her obey him, and the dream here warns her against Her compliance with it, and that she is one of those who must protect herself by obeying God and his God and avoiding doubt, so as not to fall into them. As for seeing her removing lice from her head and expelling them from her, this is evidence that she is not performing her duties to the fullest extent, and she may not be obligated to perform the prayer on time. It must be taken into account. The straight path. The Egyptian site is the largest dream interpretation site in the Arab world. All you have to do is write the Egyptian dream interpretation site in Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream of lice in hair.
